statements: SELECT * FROM game_analytics ORDER BY game_id DESC;
SELECT game_name, total_players FROM game_analytics WHERE active_players > 100;
SELECT game_name, revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE total_players BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT game_id, game_name, game_duration FROM game_analytics WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_analytics WHERE game_duration < '01:00:00';
SELECT game_name, total_players, revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE active_players > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC, game_name ASC
SELECT game_name, active_players, game_duration FROM game_analytics WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY active_players DESC
SELECT game_name, total_players, active_players, revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE total_players < 1000 ORDER BY total_players ASC
SELECT * FROM game_analytics WHERE revenue BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY game_duration DESC
SELECT game_name, total_players, revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE active_players = 50 ORDER BY total_players DESC
SELECT game_id, game_name FROM game_analytics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE play_time_minutes > 60;
SELECT game_name, active_users, total_revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE active_users > 1000;
SELECT level_name, completion_rate FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_name, total_revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE total_revenue < 5000;
SELECT * FROM game_analytics WHERE active_users > 100 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_name, total_revenue FROM game_analytics WHERE game_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY game_name ASC;

SELECT game_name, level_name, completion_rate FROM game_analytics JOIN performance_metrics ON game_analytics.game_id = performance_metrics.game_id WHERE completion_rate >= 80 ORDER BY level_name, completion_rate DESC;

SELECT game_name, total_revenue, play_time_minutes FROM game_analytics JOIN performance_metrics ON game_analytics.game_id = performance_metrics.game_id WHERE play_time_minutes > 30 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, play_time_minutes ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(total_revenue) AS average_revenue, SUM(active_users) AS total_users FROM game_analytics WHERE active_users > 50 AND total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT game_title, total_players FROM GameAnalytics;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, revenue FROM GameAnalytics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT game_title, playtime_hours FROM GameAnalytics WHERE total_players > 100 AND playtime_hours < 10;
SELECT game_id, game_title, total_players FROM GameAnalytics ORDER BY game_title ASC, total_players DESC
SELECT * FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE game_id = 3 AND interaction_type = 'play' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT game_id, AVG(average_fps) AS avg_fps, SUM(memory_usage) AS total_memory FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY game_id HAVING avg_fps > 60 ORDER BY total_memory DESC

SELECT p.player_id, g.game_title, p.interaction_timestamp FROM PlayerInteractions p JOIN GameAnalytics g ON p.game_id = g.game_id WHERE p.interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY p.interaction_timestamp ASC
SELECT game_id, revenue, playtime_hours FROM GameAnalytics WHERE revenue > 10000 AND playtime_hours < 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC, playtime_hours ASC
SELECT * FROM game_developers;
SELECT developer_name, email FROM game_developers WHERE developer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date, genre, platform FROM games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, game_id, player_name, playtime_hrs FROM player_data WHERE playtime_hrs > 10;
SELECT metric_id, game_id, daily_revenue, total_downloads FROM game_metrics WHERE total_downloads > 10000;
SELECT * FROM games ORDER BY game_name DESC, release_date ASC
SELECT game_name, genre, platform FROM games WHERE platform = 'PC' AND genre = 'Action'
SELECT developer_name, email FROM game_developers WHERE developer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT player_name, playtime_hrs, level FROM player_data WHERE playtime_hrs > 10 ORDER BY playtime_hrs DESC
SELECT game_name, active_players, daily_revenue FROM games JOIN game_metrics ON games.game_id = game_metrics.game_id WHERE active_players > 1000 ORDER BY daily_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM games
SELECT game_title, genre FROM games
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM players WHERE country='USA'
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM games WHERE developer_id = 1 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email, country FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_title, genre, developer_name FROM games g JOIN developers d ON g.developer_id = d.developer_id ORDER BY g.game_title ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM game_events WHERE player_id = 5 AND game_id = 3;
